title: Bryan Spicer
text:
Bryan Spicer is an American film and television director.
As a television director his credits include "<a href="Castle%20%28TV%20series%29">Castle</a>", "<a href="24%20%28TV%20series%29">24</a>", "<a href="Day%20Break">Day Break</a>", "<a href="Bones%20%28TV%20series%29">Bones</a>", "<a href="House%20%28TV%20series%29">House</a>", "<a href="Heroes%20%28U.S.%20TV%20series%29">Heroes</a>", "<a href="Killer%20Instinct%20%28TV%20series%29">Killer Instinct</a>", "<a href="Vanished%20%28TV%20series%29">Vanished</a>", "<a href="Prison%20Break">Prison Break</a>", "<a href="Invasion%20%282005%20TV%20series%29">Invasion</a>", "", "<a href="The%20X-Files">The X-Files</a>", "<a href="The%20Lone%20Gunmen">The Lone Gunmen</a>", "<a href="In%20Plain%20Sight">In Plain Sight</a>", "<a href="Eureka%20%28U.S.%20TV%20series%29">Eureka</a>", "<a href="Fringe%20%28TV%20series%29">Fringe</a>", "<a href="Human%20Target%20%282010%20TV%20series%29">Human Target</a>", "<a href="Hawaii%20Five-0%20%282010%20TV%20series%29">Hawaii Five-0</a>", "<a href="V%20%282009%20TV%20series%29">V</a>", "<a href="Chaos%20%28TV%20series%29">Chaos</a>", "<a href="Terra%20Nova%20%28TV%20series%29">Terra Nova</a>", "<a href="The%20Adventures%20of%20Brisco%20County%2C%20Jr.">The Adventures of Brisco County, Jr.</a>", "<a href="Once%20Upon%20a%20Time%20%28TV%20series%29">Once Upon a Time</a>", "<a href="Salute%20Your%20Shorts">Salute Your Shorts</a>" and "<a href="Magnum%20P.I.%20%282018%20TV%20series%29">Magnum P.I.</a>".
<a href="Paley%20Center%20for%20Media">Paley Center for Media</a> has preserved the first season "<a href="Salute%20Your%20Shorts">Salute Your Shorts</a>" episode "Sponge Saga" in its <a href="New%20York%20City">New York</a> archive, which was directed by Spicer. 
In 1995, Spicer made his feature film directorial debut with the film "" (1995). In 1997, he directed the films "<a href="McHale%27s%20Navy%20%281997%20film%29">McHale's Navy</a>" and "<a href="For%20Richer%20or%20Poorer">For Richer or Poorer</a>".
